sentences.sContent: How about the durability of product?
Why do we have to do durability test?
sentences.sContent_eng: Why do we have to do durability test?
sentences.sCn: 我们为什么要做耐久性测试?。

sentences.sContent: Because of the durability of vinyl, products made from this material have a long life span.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of the durability of vinyl, products made from this material have a long life span.
sentences.sCn: 由于「乙烯基」的耐久性，这种材料制成的产品具有很长的寿命。

phrases.pCn: 耐久性试验；施工测量；寿命试验；疲劳试验
化学稳定性；化学耐久性

remMethod.val: dur(持续) + ability(能力) → 持续的能力 → 耐久性
